items.sentence: Could you please tell me where Tom's office is?
I don't often win when playing tennis with Tom.
Let me assure you that that wasn't intentional.
Tom's room is a lot messier than his brother's.
My father works for the company as an engineer.
It might take more than a month to finish this.
Are you absolutely sure that's going to happen?
I want to be the best person I possibly can be.
I want to go to college, but I can't afford to.
We stayed up talking until 2:30 in the morning.
